item.title: [Python] Presentation Support System with Python3
item.description: #Introduction It is @seigo2016 of 1st year N high school programming class. It will be N high ad curry day 8. I was worried about what to write because it was a neat article, but I talked a lot about the current main project “Itokake Mandala Color Simulator” at U22 etc. So, this time I’m talking about the recent short-term project “PSS ~ Presentation Support System~”. Purpose of # PSS ~Presentation Support System~ I think that you often give presentations using PowerPoint, Google Slide, etc.
